short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Company Information when using Google Search & Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This utility displays company information from Google Search and Maps.

Some of the information displayed includes:
- Company Name
- Company Id
- Address
- Phone number
- Website
- Star Rating
- Review Count
- Company Category

The company information can be downloaded as CSV.
